desc: Building on principles introduced in 213, fourth-semester music majors examine techniques and materials used in compositions written after 1875, including chromaticism and extended tonality. Analysis of late 19th- and 20th-century music is included. Prerequisites: Music 211/213. Co-requisite: Music 212. Offered annually in the spring semester.
name: Theory IV
notes: Students in Music 214A must also register for Music 212A.
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Music 211/213. Co-requisite: Music 212. Offered annually in the spring semester.
